Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-1299 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-18
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-1299 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-18. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python3 is earlier than 3.9.19-18, affected by CVE-2026-1299
